import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import ImageCarousel from "../Component/ImageCarousel/ImageCarousel"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Header from "../Component/Header/Header"; import Footer from "../Component/Footer/Footer"; import "../AccountsAsset/form.css"; export default function Login(props) { let web = props.web.web console.log('web', web) let savedSite = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("site")) ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("site")) : []; return ( <>
